archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.1.5c: c) are prevented from initiating network connections to the internet or other untrusted networks (e.g. through configuring servers, setting rules on a firewall or using proxy servers)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
